# NullFrameShell
NullFrame Shell is a Desktop Shell built using Quickshell Toolkit for Hyprland

----
Current Preview
![Desktop Clean](./images/1.png)
![Launcher](./images/2.png)
----

> [!WARNING]
> Status: indev (Unfinished)
>
> Created in 1366x768 Resolution Monitor

### Component
- [x] Bar 
- [x] On-Screen-Display (volume/brightness/capslock/fcitx5)
- [x] QuickSetting
- [x] Desktop Widget
- [x] Notification Popups
- [x] Lyrics Display
- [x] Power Menu
- [x] Lockscreen
- [x] Launcher

### Planned
- [ ] GUI Setting

## Dependency
- Quickshell
- Material Symbol
??? (wip)
